title: Pro Tip: Don't run ANYTHING in the background or else you will get banned.
body:
For context, my girlfriend has been permanently banned for the use of 3rd party programs or exploiting.
Of her last 20 games, 18 were ARAM and 2 were normal draft. And before that they were primarily ARAM as well. 
She has zero interest in botting or anything of the sort, she is very specifically playing ARAM because she doesn't want to tryhard.
The only possible explanation we can come up with, because as expecting Riot is only saying "we are right and we won't tell you why", is that some other random app in the background is confusing them. 
She isn't running anything out of the ordinary, Discord, LINE(voip/chat app), chrome/edge, nvidia control panel, on WIN10 on a HP laptop.

Of course they don't care about anything she has to say about it.
You have been warned. DO NOT RUN ANY
PROGRAMS AT ALL IN THE BACKGROUND.

replies.body: Hmmmm there's not much I can say about what happened without having her account to look into, but it's pretty rare for someone to be unintentionally banned for having third party programs running. I'd suggest having her shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can look over what happened for you two!

I literally have no idea how to script/use third party programs/bot. So I have no idea why in the WORLD I had to submit 3 tickets and still not getting unbanned. :c Oh well. At this point.... I've tried super hard for this to get resolved and nothing is happening but tickets going in circles with the same generic response.

As the other reply guessed, 3 tickets later this is all we have. 
The account in question is Starshine (replied below)
Might I ask, any follow-up from Riot?

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBurs7,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=jfiY6kln,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2017-07-25T15:51:53.060+0000)
>
> Might I ask, any follow-up from Riot?

Just the same response... and then close the case on their own without allowing me to reply. Then sending me a survey asking how they did..... -_- I'm going to keep submitting tickets, this is absurd.

By this line, ...

> because as expecting Riot is only saying "we are right and we won't tell you why"

... I guess they already shoot a ticket to Support, and Support is refusing to answer.
And the rioter goes silent.... surprise surprise there has been zero answers so far.
Ayyyyy even we get weekends too xD! Also, as this is pertaining to someone else's account, we wouldn't be able to provide you with info about their account.
She hasn't gotten any response to her tickets. Last one is just left open with zero response at all.

Do you know about the bots in the ARAM? I think automated ban system "Yes, we're right and we won't tell you why' recognized your GF as a bot.

Try to send a ticket in Support.
already tried a few tickets, but also its a level 30 account with every champ already unlocked so not much reason to farm for anything.
